participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Sociable and fun-loving, tends to be more extroverted and enjoys the company of others. Sometimes feels lonely due to lack of long-term relationships.
participant_1.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.

participant_2.name: Emily Carter
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and thoughtful, enjoys deep conversations and has a strong appreciation for arts and literature.
participant_2.background: i've a big library at home. i am partly deaf. i am a museum tour guide. i love to drink fancy tea.
